item.title: Catielle Andressa
item.description: Catielle is a Writer and Storytelling Consultant. She has been working in the publishing market as a Ghostwriter for over ten years and also offers Consulting and Mentoring in * Creative Writing * and * Narrative * for individuals and companies. She has a degree in Pedagogy from IESCAMP and in Film Screenwriting from AIC-(Academia Internacional de Cinema) and SNCI (National School of Independent Cinema) in Italy where she currently lives.
